column5: Hello all. Anybody ever been to Cris Willis Lk. with Lakeland airways out of Temagami? Have a fly in booked with them on the fathers day weekend. Questions that I have is the fishing any good, accomadations, you know, the good, the bad, the ugly.Any input would be helpful.  Thanx in advance. johnb

I have never fished it nor can confirm that there are fish there... but Darren takes the same lads in year after year so there's gotta be something there that they go back for!  Enjoy your ride in the Beaver !!
